title: Hire Murat Alpay to design SaaS/Software Landing Page UI
body:
Hey everyone,

Hereby the official vote to hire Murat Alpay.

Assignment: Design SaaS/Software Landing Page UI Kit
Payment: 0.6Ξ ($2,400.31) or 1.05Ξ ($4,200.55) with bonus applied.

Multiple people applied for the application. After contacting them, only Murat agreed to work on the terms listed on the bounty page. His portfolio has stunning work in it. Furthermore, Murat designed for some people I know, which is always a good trusting sign.

----- APPLICATION ----
New application for SaaS/Software Landing Page UI with a bounty of 0.6Eth.

Name: MURAT ALPAY.
Portfolio URL: https://dribbble.com/muratalpay.
Social Media: https://twitter.com/imuratalpay.
Email: muratalpaydesign@gmail.com.
Intro: This is my real projects/portfolio showcase: 
https://www.figma.com/file/vtk2iL7FXtStQNkiODY1qf/For-%22rareblocks.xyz%22?node-id=6%3A110

I'm a Digital Product Designer based in Istanbul, Turkey. I like to build things with other fun and creative people. I enjoy solving complex problems through minimal solutions that have deep impacts on individuals and communities..

This person applied with the following design:
👉 https://www.figma.com/file/vtk2iL7FXtStQNkiODY1qf/For-%22rareblocks.xyz%22?node-id=6%3A110.

----- VOTE BELOW -----
author: 0x1bCbbd7f9415768338f92A9B8758fa4ABeE4FFD0
